description: 定语从句用来修饰名词或代词，由关系代词或关系副词引导

explanation.basic_structure: 先行词 + 关系词 + 从句
relative_pronouns: who/whom - 指人，who作主语，whom作宾语
which - 指物，可作主语或宾语
that - 指人或物，可作主语或宾语
whose - 指人或物，表示所有关系
usage_rules: 关系代词在从句中作主语时不能省略
关系代词在从句中作宾语时可以省略
that可以替代who/which，但在非限制性定语从句中不能用that
whose表示所有关系，相当于of which/whom
restrictive_vs_non_restrictive: 限制性定语从句：对先行词起限制作用，不能省略，不用逗号
非限制性定语从句：对先行词起补充说明作用，可以省略，用逗号隔开
common_errors: The book who I bought is interesting. (错误) → The book which/that I bought is interesting. (正确)
The man which is talking is my teacher. (错误) → The man who is talking is my teacher. (正确)
This is the school where I studied there. (错误) → This is the school where I studied. (正确)
usage_tips: 关系代词的选择要看先行词是人还是物
关系代词在从句中的成分决定用主格还是宾格
注意限制性和非限制性定语从句的区别

with_who: The man who is talking is my teacher.
The girl who I met yesterday is my classmate.
The doctor who treated me is very kind.
The students who study hard will succeed.
The person who you are looking for is not here.
with_which: The book which I bought yesterday is very interesting.
The car which is parked outside belongs to my father.
The house which we visited is very beautiful.
The problem which we discussed is very important.
The computer which I use is very fast.
with_that: The man that is talking is my teacher.
The book that I bought is interesting.
The car that is parked outside is mine.
The house that we visited is beautiful.
The problem that we discussed is important.
with_whose: The man whose car was stolen called the police.
The girl whose father is a doctor is my friend.
The house whose roof is red belongs to my uncle.
The student whose homework is perfect gets a prize.
The book whose cover is torn is very old.
with_where: This is the school where I studied.
The hotel where we stayed was very comfortable.
The park where we played is very beautiful.
The library where I often go is very quiet.
The restaurant where we had dinner was expensive.
with_when: I remember the day when we first met.
The time when the accident happened was 3:00 PM.
The year when I was born was 1990.
The moment when she arrived was very exciting.
The period when I lived there was very happy.
with_why: The reason why he left is unknown.
I don't know the reason why she is angry.
The reason why the meeting was cancelled is clear.
Can you tell me the reason why you are late?
The reason why I like this book is its interesting plot.
non_restrictive: My father, who is a doctor, works in a hospital.
The book, which I bought yesterday, is very interesting.
Beijing, which is the capital of China, is a beautiful city.
My teacher, who is very kind, helped me a lot.
The car, which is parked outside, belongs to my father.

templates.question: The man _____ is talking is my teacher.
The book _____ I bought is interesting.
This is the school _____ I studied.
The man _____ is talking is my teacher.
The book _____ I bought is interesting.
This is the school _____ I studied.

templates.sentence: The book who I bought is interesting.
The man which is talking is my teacher.
This is the school where I studied there.

templates.combined: The man who is talking is my teacher.
The book which/that I bought yesterday is interesting.
This is the school where I studied.

learning_objectives: 掌握定语从句的基本构成和用法
能够正确选择和使用关系代词
了解限制性和非限制性定语从句的区别
能够在实际语境中正确使用定语从句

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用各种定语从句，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握定语从句用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解定语从句基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对定语从句用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
